# .env.local

# 42 API credentials
NEXT_PUBLIC_42_API_URL=https://api.intra.42.fr/v2
FT_CLIENT_ID=u-s4t2ud-3ea24e9ed293f8655a8d8da5a1baec9b372b9dd1c795a79e246436c7335c5dfe
FT_CLIENT_SECRET=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

# App configuration
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL=http://localhost:3000

# See https://help.github.com/articles/ignoring-files/ for more about ignoring files.

# dependencies
/node_modules
/.pnp
.pnp.js
.yarn/*
!.yarn/patches
!.yarn/plugins
!.yarn/releases
!.yarn/versions

# testing
/coverage

# next.js
/.next/
/out/

# production
/build

# misc
.DS_Store
*.pem

# debug
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
.pnpm-debug.log*

# environment variables
.env*
!.env.example

# vercel
.vercel

# typescript
*.tsbuildinfo
next-env.d.ts
project_code.json

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "baseUrl": ".",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["./*"],
      "@/components/*": ["./components/*"],
      "@/lib/*": ["./lib/*"],
      "@/api/*": ["./lib/api/*"],
      "@/config/*": ["./config/*"],
      "@/themes": ["./lib/themes"],
      "@/mock-data": ["./lib/mock-data"],
      "@/generators/*": ["./lib/generators/*"]
    },
    "jsx": "react-jsx",
    "jsxImportSource": "react",
    "target": "ES2020",
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "strict": false,
    "skipLibCheck": true
  },
  "include": [
    "next-env.d.ts",
    "**/*.js",
    "**/*.jsx",
    "**/*.ts",
    "**/*.tsx"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules"
  ]
}
